1.text: Wash your hair 24 to 48 hours before dyeing.

2.text: Pick a color that you really like.

3.text: Protect your home and yourself from dye stains.

4.text: Put a towel or color cape around your shoulders.

6.text: Coat your hairline, ears and neck before applying dye to your hair.

8.text: Use the supplied bottle or a bowl to mix the dye.

9.text: Mix your dye with a developer.

10.text: Use a comb to separate your hair into four different sections.

11.text: Apply the dye to your hair in sections.

12.text: Set a timer for how long you need to leave the dye in your hair.

13.text: Wipe excess dye off of your neck and forehead with a paper towel or wet cloth.

14.text: Wait until the process time is up to rinse your hair.

16.text: Dry your hair and style as usual.
